EmailTemplate.name: VHM - Whitepaper Offer
EmailTemplate.subject: How To Successfully Virtualize Your Business-Critical Apps
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000decisions&utm_content=112114> <http://vmturbo.com/wp-virtualize-critical-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wp_offer>Successfully Virtualizing Business-Critical Applications <http://vmturbo.com/wp-virtualize-critical-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wp_offer> The Challenges and Best Practices <http://vmturbo.com/wp-virtualize-critical-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wp_offer> Virtualizating business-critical applications such as Microsoft Exchange, Oracle SQL server, and SAP offers substantial benefits to any organization that can successfully manage its associated complexity. But business-critical applications can be particularly sensitive to resource contention. This whitepaper <http://vmturbo.com/wp-virtualize-critical-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wp_offer> explores the challenges and best practices of virtualizing business-critical applications.
Get Free Whitepaper <http://vmturbo.com/wp-virtualize-critical-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wp_offer> <http://www.vmturbo.com/downloads?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wp_offer> <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wp_offer> <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=wp_offer> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
